com.cyc.base.connection

Interface Timer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TimerImpl

    public interface Timer
    Author:
    nwinant

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Date APOCALYPSE 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkForTimeOut()
      Throws a @see CycTimeOutException if this timer has been running longer than the timeOut.
      long getAllotedMSecs() 
      long getElapsedMilliSeconds()
      Returns the number of milliseconds that this timer has been running.
      int getElapsedSeconds()
      Returns the number of seconds that this timer has been running.
      long getRemainingMilliSeconds()
      Returns the number of milliseconds remaining till the timeout of this timer.
      int getRemainingSeconds()
      Returns the number of seconds remaining till the timeout of this timer.
      boolean isTimedOut()
      Returns true if this timer is timed out, false otherwise.
      void start()
      Restarts this timer with the same timeout it had previously.

      • checkForTimeOut

        void checkForTimeOut()
              throws CycTimeOutException
        Throws a @see CycTimeOutException if this timer has been running longer than the timeOut.
        Throws:
        CycTimeOutException - if this timer has run the specifier number of seconds.
